title: NPE in toString method for Processor Parameters in kafka-streams 3.3.1 version
body:
### Describe the bug

There is a NPE in toString method for Processor Parameters in kafka-streams 3.3.1 version, that occurs as well while using newest Quarkus. The issue is already fixed on kafka-streams side: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-14325, but Quarkus uses still kafka-streams in version 3.3.1. Version 3.3.2 will solve the problem.  

### Expected behavior

There is no NullPointerException during call toString method in ProcessorParameter class.

### Actual behavior

Reported exception:

```posh
SLF4J: Failed toString() invocation on an object of type [org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream.internals.graph.ProcessorGraphNode]
at io.quarkus.runner.GeneratedMain.main(Unknown Source)
at io.quarkus.runtime.Quarkus.run(Quarkus.java:123)
at io.quarkus.runtime.Quarkus.run(Quarkus.java:43)
at io.quarkus.runtime.Quarkus.run(Quarkus.java:69)
at java.base/java.lang.Class.newInstance(Class.java:584)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:490)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:45)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:62)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at io.quarkus.runner.ApplicationImpl.<clinit>(Unknown Source)
at io.quarkus.deployment.steps.ArcProcessor$generateResources844392269.deploy(Unknown Source)
at io.quarkus.deployment.steps.ArcProcessor$generateResources844392269.deploy_0(Unknown Source)
at io.quarkus.arc.runtime.ArcRecorder.initContainer(ArcRecorder.java:43)
at io.quarkus.arc.Arc.initialize(Arc.java:33)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.ArcContainerImpl.init(ArcContainerImpl.java:201)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.EventImpl$Notifier.notify(EventImpl.java:244)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.EventImpl$Notifier.notify(EventImpl.java:314)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.EventImpl$Notifier.notifyObservers(EventImpl.java:326)
at com.myProject.receiver.kafka.Bootstrap_Observer_onStartup_8d45c500dfea3453143aaeb6ff00b29d2d18177d.notify(Unknown Source)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.AbstractSharedContext.get(AbstractSharedContext.java:34)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.ComputingCache.computeIfAbsent(ComputingCache.java:69)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.LazyValue.get(LazyValue.java:26)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.AbstractSharedContext$1.get(AbstractSharedContext.java:34)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.AbstractSharedContext$1.get(AbstractSharedContext.java:37)
at io.quarkus.arc.impl.AbstractSharedContext.createInstanceHandle(AbstractSharedContext.java:113)
at com.myProject.receiver.kafka.Bootstrap_Bean.create(Unknown Source)
at com.myProject.receiver.kafka.Bootstrap_Bean.create(Unknown Source)
at com.myProject.receiver.kafka.Bootstrap.onConstruct(Bootstrap.java:65)

at com.myProject.commons.boundary.kafka.streaming.AbstractKafkaStream.connect(AbstractKafkaStream.java:161)
at com.myProject.commons.boundary.kafka.streaming.AbstractKafkaStream.createStream(AbstractKafkaStream.java:295)
at com.myProject.commons.boundary.kafka.streaming.AbstractKafkaStream.createTopology(AbstractKafkaStream.java:257)
at org.apache.kafka.streams.StreamsBuilder.build(StreamsBuilder.java:613)
at org.apache.kafka.streams.StreamsBuilder.build(StreamsBuilder.java:628)
at org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream.internals.InternalStreamsBuilder.buildAndOptimizeTopology(InternalStreamsBuilder.java:293)
at org.slf4j.impl.Slf4jLogger.debug(Slf4jLogger.java:196)
at org.slf4j.helpers.MessageFormatter.format(MessageFormatter.java:151)
at org.slf4j.helpers.MessageFormatter.arrayFormat(MessageFormatter.java:161)
at org.slf4j.helpers.MessageFormatter.arrayFormat(MessageFormatter.java:211)
at org.slf4j.helpers.MessageFormatter.deeplyAppendParameter(MessageFormatter.java:249)
at org.slf4j.helpers.MessageFormatter.safeObjectAppend(MessageFormatter.java:277)
at java.base/java.util.AbstractCollection.toString(AbstractCollection.java:473)
at java.base/java.lang.StringBuilder.append(StringBuilder.java:172)
at java.base/java.lang.String.valueOf(String.java:2951)
at org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream.internals.graph.ProcessorGraphNode.toString(ProcessorGraphNode.java:52)
at java.base/java.lang.StringBuilder.append(StringBuilder.java:172)
at java.base/java.lang.String.valueOf(String.java:2951)
at org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream.internals.graph.ProcessorParameters.toString(ProcessorParameters.java:133)
java.lang.NullPointerException
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin CE-WN1639PMW9 21.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.6.0: Thu Sep 29 20:13:56 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.240.7~1/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.16.1" 2022-07-19 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Zulu11.58+23-CA (build 11.0.16.1+1-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Zulu11.58+23-CA (build 11.0.16.1+1-LTS, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.14.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1

### Additional information

Link to JIRA issue from kafka-streams: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-14325 and to Github fix for this: https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/12859
